website_summaries.verdict: Visiting this endearing alien planet will result in a slime-hoarding obsession.
pros: Visit a colorful far-off planet to construct, maintain, collect, and combine a range of different lovable slimes to make even cuter hybrids
Discover how new slimes will interact, while trying to maintain order on your space ranch
These include Tabby, Crystal, Honey, and Pink slimes
cons: A single player game, with no plans for multiplayer in the future

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's 10th birthday and he played it for a couple days non stop. So far he has really enjoyed it. Personally I zoned out watching, but he really has enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.author: Karla Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Hands down one of my favorite video games
customer_reviews.text: I'm an early 20s college student and got this game free through Xbox Live years ago and loved it. It's a fun exploration/farming game that's super cute. It's basics are easy and the strategy in designing your ranch is really fun. Plus it's great for all ages even a six year old I'm confident could do alright with enough challenge for older adults in optimizing the game. Great game for kids and adults. I bought this copy just because I wanted a physical one for my shelf and to support the developer who added tons of content to the game for free after release.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for our nephew and he said it was the best. He was so excited to tell us all about it. It was worth every penny to hear how happy he was with this game!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping for gifts

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Unique, and Lengthy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend as a surprise birthday gift along with another game he already asked for. I hoped he would like it because he loves farming games. He LOVED this game. The game is quite lengthy according to him so you get your money's worth. He actually played this game first over the one he asked for. I watched him play it and it looks very fun. If you're into farming games this is a very unique experience that I wouldn't pass up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rana

customer_reviews.title: No violence and 6 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson loves this game. I like it because there is no blood or guts or killing.
customer_reviews.author: Temple Naff

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is really happy with this game. She is ten and says it's a five star game. She heard of it from a YouTuber she watches.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Super fun game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! I bought it for my 4 year old but ended up taking over and playing it myself because it looked like so much fun. I would definitely recommend it to people that like any type of sims game (you’re building your own ranch) and mission based (you have to complete missions to get access to new slime) games. The only thing I wish is that they had small competitions imbedded so that I could play with my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Nessa Bella

customer_reviews.title: Eleven year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this game. From what I have watched, she gathers different breeds of slimes, and runs the day to day of slime ranching, (Similar to real ranching, providing care, slime enrichment, feeding, and selling the "plorts" they the slime provides). Each "breed" of slime is different and has different requirements for care.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great game, 9yr old daughter loves it too!
customer_reviews.text: I had this game on my old computer through steam and my 9yr old loved the game on there as well. When my computer broke and got a new one I established a no gaming rule for my laptop since I use it for work and don't want it to break or get any type of accidental viruses. So I was so happy when I found out this was also available on xbox one. My 9yr old still loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It's a cute game but a little boring
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter wanted it for her Christmas present. It's a very cute game, but it's kinda boring. she finished everything in a week and there is no point to play again.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMocha

customer_reviews.title: Came on time
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this game for Christmas and I haven't seen him play it but once. Not sure if it's boring or what. But, I would assume it isn't the funnest or else he would be playing it nonstop like most kids.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Addictive and relaxing with beautiful visuals
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun, relaxing game with a lot to explore and do. I’ve already spent hours on the game and it is one of my favorites. If you like games where you can collect things, craft recipes, and explore open worlds at your own pace, this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: PikaProf

customer_reviews.title: What the hell is a slime rancher?
customer_reviews.text: Man, I don't know what the hell a slime rancher is. I haven't asked my son, because he would have told me, and then I would have to listen to him explain it and I still wouldn't know what a slime rancher is. He loves this game. Money very well spent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Slime rancher
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old can not seem to put this game down. He is so excited to find and breed the new slimes. I had to also buy a copy for my pc. 10/10 wish there were more games like this.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: Fun, Fun
customer_reviews.text: Other games are just to much for me, so I was very happy to find this sweet game. I'm have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Ninalove

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as ordered
customer_reviews.text: My daughter truly enjoys this game. Arrived quickly and in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Cadbury

customer_reviews.title: Save money live better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to understand, fun addicting gameplay. Easily hours of gameplay.
customer_reviews.author: MiaTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this game. Says it's really fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Video game
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Christmas present. My son loves this game.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Fun game!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 and 10 year old boys love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Packaging and game were in perfect condition. Son enjoys the game. I think it was a little over priced, but I grew up in the 80's and games were a fraction of the cost they are now.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for younger gamers. My five year old loves it and I love it because there isn’t any violence. My husband has also become extremely wrapped up in it. Great family game!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grandson loves loves loves this game. It has great graphics, great subject matter. I even played with him. It was nice to have a game I didn't have to worry about language, subject matter or violence. Just clean fun.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this game
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say, my son is an avid fan of Slime Ranchers. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fun game- worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves the game. Item was shipped quickly and worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Have played it on PC and was so happy to see it for Xbox so I could play it. Really enjoy this game.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dominick

customer_reviews.title: Cute Game
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! The slimes are adorable and I never seem to get bored when playing it. Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fun single person game
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this game! It is a one person game so no group play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient service
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift, and my teenager- to- be loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiana

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's the video game my daughter wanted it worked as it is supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Curt Richrath

customer_reviews.title: Cute game.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game. It’s refreshing due most games are about killing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute game. Fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this game. Gives them a break from Fortnight
customer_reviews.author: Linda Baxter

product_meta.title: Slime Rancher - Xbox One
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox One| Edition:StandardSlime Rancher is the tale of Beatrix Leboa, a plucky, young rancher who sets out for a life a thousand light years away from Earth on the 'Far, Far Range' where she tries her hand at making a living wrangling slimes. With a can-do attitude, plenty of grit, and her trusty backpack, Beatrix attempts to stake a claim, amass a fortune, and avoid the continual peril that looms from the rolling, jiggling avalanche of slimes around every corner!
feature_bullets: Use your backpack to vat up and shoot out anything you see!
Explore a big, wild world in style... jetpack style
Your very own ranch to call home and customize!
Countless slimes everywhere. Maybe too many if we're being honest
Create new slime types using slime science and PROFIT! Push your slime science experiments too far and PERISH!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars446 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
